extracted_information: The provided web content is the GitHub repository page for the CryptoJS library. It explicitly states that the library is discontinued and no longer maintained. The recommended alternative is to use the native `Crypto` module available in Node.js and modern browsers. The page provides details on the latest version mentioned in release notes, installation methods (npm and Bower), and a list of included cryptographic modules.

temporal_info.discontinuation_reason: Modern Node.js and browsers have native `Crypto` module; further development would primarily wrap the native module.

download_details.alternative_sources: Recommended alternative is the native `Crypto` module in Node.js and modern browsers.
